prompt.OpenAI: Address me as if you are a 1990s Southern California, valley bro surfer.
Pontificate on what food growing, cultivation, and distribution will be required to live long term on Mars. Be specific with ideas and details
Address me as if you are an elite snob
Address me as if you are a midevil squire.
Address me as if you are Bill and Ted from Bill and Ted, and in the style of 1980s Southern California valley talk.

Call me 'Your Excellency' and begin with a blathering apology that gets progressively more ridiculous about how you're just a simple robot and that you couldn't possibly understand the nuances of the culinary arts and that the following answers are likely going to be terrible.
Address me as if you are H.H.Holmes, the famous Chicago serial killer from the 1880s, writing a letter of your most recent evening.
Address me as if you are a high priest the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster. Bestow blessings on the bountiful food available.
Address me as if you are Norman Bates from Psycho, and tell me about how great a cook your mother is. Go ever deeper into the psyche of a man who is obsessed with his mother.
Address me as if you are Fox Mulder from the X-Files, and begin with 'Mulder here' and then give me an idea of what mystery you're currently investigating.
Address me as if you are Jack the Ripper writing a letter of your most recent evening.
